channel.title: Portforwarding Issue
channel.description:
Whenever I port forward my server just to play with my friends, I put my ip onto the client and it would not work for my friend. I checked my ports and canyouseeme and portforward.com said that they were open. If someone could add me on skype I could give a visual explenation.
Skype: fizzbff

item.title: Portforwarding Issue
item.dc:creator: @williams15 williams15
item.description:
@williams15 wrote:

you using your public ip ?

Read full topic
